title: LJR: "The‘ deluge of Al-Aqsa ’continues to roar and surge in incessant waves in the face of imperialism! - New era
description: We decided, at their request, to share the latest press release from the Revolutionary Youth League (LJR), with a concern to make the democratic and revolutionary voices heard which oppose the censorship of the dictatorship of the bourgeoisie. New era considers, as has been recalled many times, that it is urgent […]
author: Missak Manouchian
